CustomField.description: This is the number of people who registered, but did not attend. This includes both cancellations, and people who just didn't show up. This does not include Sponsors, Press or Staff.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the number of people who registered, but did not attend. This includes both cancellations, and people who just didn't show up. This does not include Sponsors, Press or Staff.
CustomField.label: No Shows / Cancellations Roll-Up Summary
